Name: Amelanchier canadensis
column10: A large erect deciduous shrub or small tree to 6m in height, of open habit, with oval, green-bronze leaves when young which turn shades of orange and red in autumn. Clusters of small, star-shaped white flowers are produced in spring followed by dark purple to black berries

Name: Aucuba japonica 'Crotonifolia'
column10: Crotonifolia' is a compact medium-sized evergreen shrub with large leathery leaves heavily spotted and blotched with deep yellow. Flowers small, purple, female, followed by bright red berries when pollinate

Name: Berberis darwinii & other species
column10: A dense, medium-sized evergreen shrub, with dark glossy green, broadly oblong, sparsely-spined leaves, and drooping racemes of rich orange flowers, tinged red in bud, followed by blue-black berries

Name: Cotoneaster  suecicus 'Skogholm'
column10: An evergreen ground-covering shrub to a height of 60cm, with oval, dark green leaves up to 2cm in length. In late spring, white flowers are borne in small bunches or singly; red berries follow
